trans-unit.source: Through the Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments namespace, you can create and manage appointments in a user's calendar app.
trans-unit.target: Through the Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments namespace, you can create and manage appointments in a user's calendar app.

trans-unit.source: Manage appointments
trans-unit.target: Manage appointments

trans-unit.source: Manage appointments
trans-unit.target: Manage appointments

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Through the [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263359) namespace, you can create and manage appointments in a user's calendar app.
trans-unit.target: Through the [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263359) namespace, you can create and manage appointments in a user's calendar app.

trans-unit.source: Here, we'll show you how to create an appointment, add it to a calendar app, replace it in the calendar app, and remove it from the calendar app.
trans-unit.target: Here, we'll show you how to create an appointment, add it to a calendar app, replace it in the calendar app, and remove it from the calendar app.

trans-unit.source: We'll also show how to display a time span for a calendar app and create an appointment-recurrence object.
trans-unit.target: We'll also show how to display a time span for a calendar app and create an appointment-recurrence object.

trans-unit.source: Create an appointment and apply data to it
trans-unit.target: Create an appointment and apply data to it

trans-unit.source: Create a [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments.Appointment**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221) object and assign it to a variable.
trans-unit.target: Create a [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments.Appointment**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221) object and assign it to a variable.

trans-unit.source: Then, apply to the **Appointment** the appointment properties that were supplied through the UI by a user.
trans-unit.target: Then, apply to the **Appointment** the appointment properties that were supplied through the UI by a user.

trans-unit.source: Add an appointment to the user's calendar
trans-unit.target: Add an appointment to the user's calendar

trans-unit.source: Create a [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments.Appointment**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221) object and assign it to a variable.
trans-unit.target: Create a [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments.Appointment**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221) object and assign it to a variable.

trans-unit.source: Then, call the [**AppointmentManager.ShowAddAppointmentAsync(Appointment, Rect, Placement)**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showaddappointmentasync-253292089) method to show the default appointments provider add-appointment UI, to enable the user to add an appointment.
trans-unit.target: Then, call the [**AppointmentManager.ShowAddAppointmentAsync(Appointment, Rect, Placement)**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showaddappointmentasync-253292089) method to show the default appointments provider add-appointment UI, to enable the user to add an appointment.

trans-unit.source: If the user clicked **Add**, the sample prints the appointment identifier that **ShowAddAppointmentAsync** returned.
trans-unit.target: If the user clicked **Add**, the sample prints the appointment identifier that **ShowAddAppointmentAsync** returned.

trans-unit.source: **Note** For Windows Phone Store apps, [**ShowAddAppointment**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showaddappointmentasync) functions just like [**ShowEditNewAppointment**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showeditnewappointmentasync) in that the dialog displayed for adding the appointment is editable.
trans-unit.target: **Note** For Windows Phone Store apps, [**ShowAddAppointment**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showaddappointmentasync) functions just like [**ShowEditNewAppointment**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showeditnewappointmentasync) in that the dialog displayed for adding the appointment is editable.

trans-unit.source: Replace an appointment in the user's calendar
trans-unit.target: Replace an appointment in the user's calendar

trans-unit.source: Create a [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments.Appointment**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221) object and assign it to a variable.
trans-unit.target: Create a [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments.Appointment**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221) object and assign it to a variable.

trans-unit.source: Then, call the appropriate [**AppointmentManager.ShowReplaceAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showreplaceappointmentasync) method to show the default appointments provider replace-appointment UI to enable the user to replace an appointment.
trans-unit.target: Then, call the appropriate [**AppointmentManager.ShowReplaceAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showreplaceappointmentasync) method to show the default appointments provider replace-appointment UI to enable the user to replace an appointment.

trans-unit.source: The user also provides the appointment identifier that they want to replace.
trans-unit.target: The user also provides the appointment identifier that they want to replace.

trans-unit.source: This identifier was returned from [**AppointmentManager.ShowAddAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showaddappointmentasync).
trans-unit.target: This identifier was returned from [**AppointmentManager.ShowAddAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showaddappointmentasync).

trans-unit.source: If the user clicked **Replace**, the sample prints that it updated that appointment identifier.
trans-unit.target: If the user clicked **Replace**, the sample prints that it updated that appointment identifier.

trans-unit.source: Remove an appointment from the user's calendar
trans-unit.target: Remove an appointment from the user's calendar

trans-unit.source: Call the appropriate [**AppointmentManager.ShowRemoveAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showremoveappointmentasync) method to show the default appointments provider remove-appointment UI, to enable the user to remove an appointment.
trans-unit.target: Call the appropriate [**AppointmentManager.ShowRemoveAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showremoveappointmentasync) method to show the default appointments provider remove-appointment UI, to enable the user to remove an appointment.

trans-unit.source: The user also provides the appointment identifier that they want to remove.
trans-unit.target: The user also provides the appointment identifier that they want to remove.

trans-unit.source: This identifier was returned from [**AppointmentManager.ShowAddAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showaddappointmentasync).
trans-unit.target: This identifier was returned from [**AppointmentManager.ShowAddAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showaddappointmentasync).

trans-unit.source: If the user clicked **Delete**, the sample prints that it removed the appointment specified by that appointment identifier.
trans-unit.target: If the user clicked **Delete**, the sample prints that it removed the appointment specified by that appointment identifier.

trans-unit.source: Show a time span for the appointments provider
trans-unit.target: Show a time span for the appointments provider

trans-unit.source: Call the [**AppointmentManager.ShowTimeFrameAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showtimeframeasync) method to show a specific time span for the default appointments provider's primary UI if the user clicked **Show**.
trans-unit.target: Call the [**AppointmentManager.ShowTimeFrameAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showtimeframeasync) method to show a specific time span for the default appointments provider's primary UI if the user clicked **Show**.

trans-unit.source: The sample prints that the default appointments provider appeared on screen.
trans-unit.target: The sample prints that the default appointments provider appeared on screen.

trans-unit.source: Create an appointment-recurrence object and apply data to it
trans-unit.target: Create an appointment-recurrence object and apply data to it

trans-unit.source: Create an [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments.AppointmentRecurrence**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221recurrence) object and assign it to a variable.
trans-unit.target: Create an [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments.AppointmentRecurrence**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221recurrence) object and assign it to a variable.

trans-unit.source: Then, apply to the **AppointmentRecurrence** the recurrence properties that were supplied through the UI by a user.
trans-unit.target: Then, apply to the **AppointmentRecurrence** the recurrence properties that were supplied through the UI by a user.

trans-unit.source: Add a new editable appointment
trans-unit.target: Add a new editable appointment

trans-unit.source: [**ShowEditNewAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showeditnewappointmentasync) works just like [**ShowAddAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showaddappointmentasync) except that the dialog for adding the appointment is editable so that the user can modify the appointment data before saving it.
trans-unit.target: [**ShowEditNewAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showeditnewappointmentasync) works just like [**ShowAddAppointmentAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showaddappointmentasync) except that the dialog for adding the appointment is editable so that the user can modify the appointment data before saving it.

trans-unit.source: Show appointment details
trans-unit.target: Show appointment details

trans-unit.source: [**ShowAppointmentDetailsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showappointmentdetailsasync) causes the system to show details for the specified appointment.
trans-unit.target: [**ShowAppointmentDetailsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297221manager-showappointmentdetailsasync) causes the system to show details for the specified appointment.

trans-unit.source: An app that implements app calendars may choose to be activated to show details for appointments in calendars it owns.
trans-unit.target: An app that implements app calendars may choose to be activated to show details for appointments in calendars it owns.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the system will show the appointment details.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, the system will show the appointment details.

trans-unit.source: An overload of the method that accepts a start date argument is provided to show details for an instance of a recurring appointment.
trans-unit.target: An overload of the method that accepts a start date argument is provided to show details for an instance of a recurring appointment.

trans-unit.source: Summary and next steps
trans-unit.target: Summary and next steps

trans-unit.source: Now you have a basic understanding of how to manage appointments.
trans-unit.target: Now you have a basic understanding of how to manage appointments.

trans-unit.source: Download the [Universal Windows app samples](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619979) from GitHub to see more examples of how to manage appointments.
trans-unit.target: Download the [Universal Windows app samples](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619979) from GitHub to see more examples of how to manage appointments.

trans-unit.target: Related topics
